    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/106682</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765085816</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Holding a poetry slam</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anhalten eines Poesieknalls</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tenir un claquement de poésie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Prendendo um slam da poesia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Tenuta uno slam di poesia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κράτημα ενός βρόντου ποίησης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Llevar a cabo un golpe de la poesía</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Introducing students to "the competitive art of performance poetry" builds enthusiasm for literature among even reluctant readers. This article explains how a high school in Cleveland County, North Carolina, held its first poetry slam.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kursteilnehmer vorstellend ", die konkurrierende 
kunst von Leistung Poesie" baut Begeisterung für Literatur unter 
sogar widerstrebenden Lesern auf. Dieser Artikel beschreibt, wie
eine High School in der Cleveland Grafschaft, Nord-Carolina, seinen 
ersten Poesieknall anhielt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Présentant des étudiants "l'art concurrentiel de
la poésie d'exécution" établit l'enthousiasme pour la littérature 
parmi même les lecteurs réticents. Cet article explique 
comment un lycée dans le comté de Cleveland, Caroline du nord, 
a tenu son premier claquement de poésie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Introduzindo estudantes "a arte do competidor da 
poesia do desempenho" constrói o entusiasmo para a literatura entre 
mesmo leitores relutantes. Este artigo explica como uma High 
School no condado de Cleveland, North.carolina, prendeu seu primeiro 
slam da poesia.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Introducendo gli allievi "l'arte competitiva della
poesia di prestazioni" sviluppa l'entusiasmo per letteratura fra 
persino i lettori riluttanti. Questo articolo spiega come una 
High School nella contea de Cleveland, North.carolina, ha tenuto il 
relativo primo slam di poesia.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η εισαγωγή των σπουδαστών "στην ανταγωνιστική τέχνη 
της ποίησης απόδοσησ" χτίζει τον ενθουσιασμό για τη λογοτεχνία 
μεταξύ ακόμη και των απρόθυμων αναγνωστών. Αυτό το άρθρο 
εξηγεί πώς ένα γυμνάσιο στο νομό του Κλήβελαντ, βόρεια 
Καρολίνα, κράτησε τον πρώτο βρόντο ποίησής του.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Introduciendo a estudiantes "el arte competitivo 
de la poesía del funcionamiento" construye el entusiasmo para la 
literatura entre incluso programas de lectura renuentes. Este 
artículo explica cómo una High School secundaria en el condado de 
Cleveland, Carolina del Norte, llevó a cabo su primer golpe de la 
poesía.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

    </metadata>
  </description>
